media:group.media:title: The Condottiero! (AoE2)
media:group.media:description:
Breakdown and discussion of the Italian's team unit - the Condottiero! More specifically, we'll see how it compares to the champion in a few different situations, as well as discuss which civilizations benefit the most from an Italian ally.  

0:55 Condottiero stats vs Champion
2:05 Hidden attack bonuses
2:38 Gunpowder resistance
3:22 Upgrades
4:40 vs Champion
5:20 vs Trash units
6:03 vs Eagles
6:40 vs Hand Cannons
7:25 vs Janissaries
8:02 vs Arbalesters
8:30 The best condottieros
9:35 Civs with bad champions

Game: Age of Empires II Definitive Edition
